title: Convert string to camelcase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to camelcase

Camelcase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized except the first word.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "helloWorld"

markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to camelcase

Camelcase is a style of writing in which the first letter of each word is capitalized except the first word.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "helloWorld"
```
